fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: All relevant acts and guidelines issued by the EU on Food Law regulations, including the Nutrition and Health Claims Regulations, the Food Information Regulation, the Fortification Regulation, the Novel Foods Regulation, the Food Additives, Flavourings and Enzymes Regulations, the Plastics Regulation, EU Reach and related Chemical and Environmental Regulations, the Biocides Regulation, EU Privacy and Data Security Regulations, the relevant draft amendments currently being discussed, such as the draft BPA Regulation, the revision of the Ceramics Directive, the Drinking Water Directive.
